text: Norman Burt Sherry (July 16, 1931 â€“ March 8, 2021) was an American catcher, manager, and coach who played five seasons in Major League Baseball (MLB). He played for the Los Angeles Dodgers and New York Mets from 1959 to 1963. Sherry died on March 8, 2021, at an assisted living facility in San Juan Capistrano, California at the age of 89. ==References== ==Other websites== *Norm Sherry at B-R Bullpen Category:1931 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Los Angeles Dodgers players Category:New York Mets players Category:Sportspeople from New York City
